Orthodontics by Orthodontists

(and Aerospace Engineers, Bone Biologists, Computer
Scientists, and Orthodontic Practice Experts)

Listen to your patients. Set yourself Apart.

Your patients have been asking for invisible. Give them what they really want, no attachments, no reservations. No longer make the tradeoff between finish quality and esthetics. Give your patients the best experience possible. They will tell their friends.

Ease of Use

Your expertise is in creating the outcomes that meet you and your patients goals. The two most important days for your patients are the day they start treatment, and the day they finish. INBRACE Smartwires make everyday in between as effective and efficient as possible, we don’t rely on patient compliance to achieve great outcomes on schedule.

Focus on outcomes

INBRACE was designed to be easily integrated into your practice using the digital workflow you are familiar with and bonding techniques that your staff is trained. Since INBRACE doesn’t require wire bending adjustments and regular activations, your practice can reduce chair time, while improving the patient’s experience with most of the pain points of working beind

Results you’ll love

In just 7 weeks, Evelyn got that perfect smile

In just 7 weeks, Evelyn got that perfect smile

How it works

1. INBRACE Virtual Treatement Plan (VTx) - Spend your time designing the dieal setup for your patient. Each INBRACE Smartwires is programmed to faithfully reproduce your setup

2. INBRACE Positioning System - INBRACE Bracekts are pre-positioned and precision placed via indirect bonding

3. INBRACE Smartwires are locked into position and tooth movement is initiated. That’s it. Light, continuous force is applied by our Smartwires to gently guide teeth to their destination
